name: Chestnut's Home
description:
CHESTNUT'S HOME 

Game made for Cozy Fall Jam 2022 with theme "Trading Places".

Windows binary recommended for better experience.

Description

We decided to refer to the topic by a story in which a young person unaware of the consequences litter in a nearby forest. The forest spirits, angry with his actions, incarnate him into a squirrel named Chestnut to show him that the place he treated like a garbage can is someone's home. To redeem himself, he must clear the forest and help his tribe of squirrels collect chestnuts for the winter.

Credits

Made by three friends, we call ourselves Great as Cabbage.

Used tools and software
  • Unity 2021.3.10f1
  • Pyxel Edit
  • Blender
  • Studio One 5
  • Audacity
  • MSPaint
  • Trello
